extensionDesc.message: Generates web page summaries using Gemini AI. It's free!

textAPI.message:
Generate a professional summary in Spanish of the following content: You decide the length of the summary depending on the length of the content but the length of the summary must be less than {WORD_LIMIT} words, with {MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH} characters After the summary, a section listing key points with no more than 10 Key Points should be added. At the end of the summary a conclusion section should be added,  Determine the best possible title for the content  your entire answer must be formatted using markdown,In the summary you must maintain the key points of the following content:

{CONTENT}
